entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and ending near noon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
